snippet: Alabama running back Derrick Henry was the biggest star of college football’s awards night, winning the Maxwell Award, given to the college player of the year, and the Doak Walker Award, given to the nation’s top running back.
abstract: Alabama running back Derrick Henry wins both Maxwell Award and Doak Walker Award.
lead_paragraph: Alabama running back Derrick Henry was the biggest star of college football’s awards night, winning the Maxwell Award, given to the college player of the year, and the Doak Walker Award, given to the nation’s top running back.
